Network Security Lab website

5 September 2024 1 min read

We are excited to announce the launch of our new website!

Welcome to our new website!

We are excited to announce the creation of our new website! At the Network Security Lab, we have created a new website to showcase our research and activities in network security. On the site, you’ll find several key sections:

  • People: Meet the members of our research group.
  • Students: Discover the students who are working or have worked with us on their thesis projects.
  • Publications: Browse our updated list of publications.
  • News: Stay up-to-date with the latest news from our group.

Visit our site to learn more and stay connected with our work!

© 2024 Network Security Lab. Site based on Jekyll and Bootstrap.

Made by Edoardo Di Paolo.
